items.sentence: Tom has been dating Mary for about three years.
Tom would\'ve succeeded if he\'d worked harder.
Tom wouldn\'t be here if he didn\'t have to be.
Are you sure you don\'t want me to talk to Tom?
Are you sure you don\'t want to move to Boston?
Are you sure you don\'t want us to go with you?
Are you telling me you don\'t know where it is?
I\'d rather stay at home than go to the movies.
I\'ll be staying in Australia for three months.
I\'ll come back for my suitcase this afternoon.
